A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This was the best film I've seen in along time. Being a huge fan of star wars it's self\, TLJ really showed what star wars is. To new and old fans of this amazing saga\, watch this movie. It's nostalgic and just an awesome movie. It reminds me of Empire and ROTJ in so many good and amazing ways. Please see this\, you won't regret it.
